Follow.text1: is the diksha name given to
Follow.text2: Vinita Rashinkar by her revered Guruji.
Follow.text3: She is a spiritual healer, writer, speaker and wellness expert, the Founding Director of Sri Chakra Yantra Foundation and organisation created with the intention of bringing individuals and organisations together to improve health and well-being, cultivate spiritual knowledge, expand consciousness and provide authentic information about Tantra and Sri Vidya as outlined in the Hindu Scriptures.

Meet.heading: Connect with VinitaSri
Meet.text: VinitaSri has spent years immersed in the path of Sri Vidya sadhana—a journey of spiritual practice and inner transformation. Her calling now is to share this light with others. If you are ready to uncover your highest version, she invites you to connect with her and allow her to guide you on your spiritual path.

Chat.chat1: Ask questions, share how you feel,

Chatagain.user: How meditation can help me in my daily routine?
Chatagain.bot: Meditation helps with attention span, allowing you to stay focused longer. Enhanced willpower: Meditation develops the mental discipline needed to avoid unhelpful habits. Better sleep: Meditation can shorten the time it takes to fall asleep and improve sleep quality.

Profile.footerQuote: Your spiritual journey is unique. Trust the process, embrace the growth, and remember that every step forward is sacred.
